_meanings:
{@--2@} (In
<ab>Rhet.</ab>) Identification of two things
({#prakfta#} and {#aprakfta#}) in such a manner
that the one is completely absorbed
into the other; {#nigIryADyavasAnaM tu#} 
{#prakftasya pareRa yat#} <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; on such 
identification is founded the figure called
{#atiSayokti#}, and the {#lakzaRA#} called  
{#sADyavasAnA#}. See <ls>K. P. 2.</ls>
